heading: Wednesday Night
text: Partly to mostly cloudy. Scattered snow showers north and in the southern Greens; a trace to an inch. Lows in the single digits to around 10 above in the Champlain Valley, otherwise zero to ten below, with cold spots around 15 below. West to northwest winds 5 to 10 mph, and diminishing.

heading: Thursday
text: Partly to mostly cloudy. Chance of a snow shower, mainly in the northern mountains. Lows from zero to 10 below, colder hollows around 15 below. Valley wind chills from 10 to 20 below in the south and in the Champlain Valley, 15 to 25 below elsewhere north. West to northwest winds 5 to 10 mph, gusting to 20 mph.
